name: Laundry Powder - Grandma Helen Says Keep Your Clothes Clean - 6/12 loads
description:
Grandma Helen was always one of those ladies who always believed in the power of home-made goodness. This laundry powder was created with her in mind.

One tablespoon is all you need to get a regular load of clothes clean -- 1/2 Tablespoon for High Efficiency Washers. This recyclable carton (milk carton, cool!) has enough for 6 regular/12 HE loads.

The soap used has a naturally fresh scent, just enough to give you that nice, clean fragrance without overpowering. Also included is the blue scoop pictured; a 1TB measure.

There are three simple ingredients in our laundry powder, and we product test each batch on our own clothing.

GreenFamilyTree believes in doing something to invest in what's real -- a better environment, and a happier planet.

categories.name: Grandma Helen Says Keep Your Clothes Clean

name: The Silk Road - Auntie Yvie Says Keep Those Goodies Clean - Sample Size
description:
This 2 ounce sample of shaving soap will leave your skin silky smooth. It’s made of natural shea butter and scented lightly (very, very lightly), so your will have minimum skin irritation.

Simply lather up, spread and shave away… and follow up with our upcoming shave lotion when you’re done and your skin will have that someone special itching to touch it.

categories.name: Auntie Yvie Says Keep Those Goodies Clean

name: Preserve Your Sexy - Brother G Says Keep Your Pimp Hand Clean - Sample
description:
Brother G is that guy who always has himself put together just enough to turn heads -- in a good way. This is one of the soaps that keeps him that way.

So, how the heck do you preserve your sexy? Use this soap and you'll find out.

This is just a small, 2 ounce taste of the full package, and it's ready to offer up a healthy lather. The goat's milk will make sure that you skin is left soft and touchable after shaving, and the cinnamon is there to give you an extra umph! first thing in the morning.

Cinnamon contains a substantial amount of tannin and has very powerful antiseptic properties. Cinnamon also helps treat acne, so it may actually help with those annoying razor bumps.

Gift-wrap is available for this soap, just in case you're getting your guy a gift. Otherwise, this will come in a plain brown wrapper. It wouldn't do to give away all your secrets to the competition, guys!

So, yeah, preserve your sexy. No one else is going to do it for you. Maybe.How the heck do you preserve your sexy? Use this soap and you'll find out.

And if you're *still* wondering where your pimp hand is right now, you have it all under control after using this soap.

categories.name: Brother G Says Keep Your Pimp Hand Clean

name: Yuzu Powerhouse Sachet - Set of Three
description:
This little tiny powerhouses are only about 3.5" square, but they pack a big wallop, as they are stuffed full of flax seed & Yuzu Fragrance Oil. Yuzu is a Japanese citrusy fruit that has a light clean, but sweet fragrance. They're so strong they will come double-bagged to you, in order to save the sweet smelling freshness just for you!

Simply toss as many of these guys in your dryer as you want, run and get ready to hear "Gee! Your clothes smell terrific!" There we go with the corny quotes again. Sheesh.

You can even use these in your linen drawer, in a closet, anywhere you can think of to get a shot of freshness.

When the scent is faded, simply re-fresh with our lavender freshener sprays and you're off to the races again!

categories.name: Grandma Helen Says Keep Your Clothes Clean

name: Buzz Bars - 5.7 ounce Bar
description:
Look at this big fat whopping bar. It's almost 6 ounces. Brother G said that, while you were keeping that pimp hand clean, you might as well do it like a pimp.

This bar is great for those mornings after the night before. It made with a goat's milk, with real coffee (can't tell you the brand name, but it's the best part of waking up), sugar (because, guys, admit it, you like a good sugar scrub too) and a light vanilla walnut fragrance.

With this economy, it sure is better to use this soap that head down to You-Know-Who-Bucks for a $7.00 frippa-frappaccino. I mean really. It's coffee, sugar and cream. What more can you ask for?

categories.name: Brother G Says Keep Your Pimp Hand Clean
